abstract: The Blackstone Group and the billionaire Carl C. Icahn have sent preliminary deal proposals to Dell Inc., people briefed on the matter said on Saturday, signaling that a potential three-way race for control of the computer company is underway.
snippet: The Blackstone Group and the billionaire Carl C. Icahn have sent preliminary deal proposals to Dell Inc., people briefed on the matter said on Saturday, signaling that a potential three-way race for control of the computer company is underway.

headline.main: Blackstone and Icahn Are Said to Make Preliminary Bids for Dell
headline.print_headline: Blackstone Is Said to Make a Preliminary Bid for Dell

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced and Andrew Ross Sorkin
